resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
mbrobbel opened a new pull request #11792:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11792


   Renamed `BitUtil` namespace to `bit_util` and `LittleEndianArray` namespace to `little_endian` to match the suggested style in https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Namespace_Names.
   
   I renamed the `LittleEndianArray` namespace to `little_endian` to handle a symbol conflict with the `little_endian_array` function in `arrow/util/basic_decimal.h`.


--

pitrou commented on a change in pull request #11792:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11792#discussion_r759243753



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/util/bit_util_test.cc
##########
@@ -154,8 +154,8 @@ void ASSERT_BYTES_EQ(const uint8_t* left, const std::vector<uint8_t>& right) {
   ASSERT_EQ(left_array, right);
 }
 
-TEST(BitUtilTests, TestIsMultipleOf64) {

Review comment:
       Can you undo the test naming changes here?




--

ursabot commented on pull request #11792:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11792#issuecomment-982661703


   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 41df46e3106847f81ba032e219c2854df11bbd45 and contender = 8daa7a4ed5629c0020dadf7325a6b523bdfc62e9. 8daa7a4ed5629c0020dadf7325a6b523bdfc62e9 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/97e6bb5df58f45e9aed214900e24cf93...d72e5574441e45cd813712c65492d8fc/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/f60d4a78491341f8822422f4bb28d63f...780888b1e77f41d19d3c83690a20e4fb/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/859033b09a1a41edbf6694881169f19c...b50ec78ea80241d8b87d623787dd409d/)
   Supported benchmarks:
   ursa-i9-9960x: langs = Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: langs = C++, Java
   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: cloud = True

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

fields.description: {{namespace BitUtil}} is not allowed by the style guide, which requires namespaces to be in snake_case: https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Namespace_Names
